Name: Logout from IFS Application and Verify Landing Page
Description: Log in to the IFS application, log out, and verify successful navigation back to the landing page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Login
Step 3: Navigate to /main/ifsapplications/web/*
Step 4: Click on button userDropdown
Step 5: Click on button logout -> Navigate to page '/landing-page'
Step 6: Click on link ifsiCloud -> Navigate to page '/auth/realms/*/protocol/openid-connect/auth'
Step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: User Logout from Main IFS Applications
Description: Navigate to the main IFS applications page, log in, access the user dropdown, and log out. Verify the landing page after logout.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Login
Step 3: Navigate to /main/ifsapplications/web/*
Step 4: Click on button userDropdown
Step 5: Click on button logout -> Navigate to page '/landing-page'
Step 6: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Login and Verify Home Page Access in IFS Cloud Application
Description: Navigate to the landing page, log in using OpenID Connect, search for content, and verify access to the home page.

Step 4: Navigate to /main/ifsapplications/web/*
Step 5: Click on input search
Step 6: Enter input value in input search
Step 7: Click on link wwwIfs -> Navigate to page ''
Step 8: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Step 1: Navigate to /landing-page
Step 2: Click on link ifscloud -> Navigate to page '/auth/realms/*/protocol/openid-connect/auth'
Step 3: Login -> Navigate to page '/main/ifsapplications/web/*'
Step 4: Navigate to /main/ifsapplications/web/*
Step 5: Click on input search
Step 6: Enter input value in input search

Step 15: Click on item english
Step 16: Click on button save
Step 17: Click on button status
Step 18: Click on button qualified
Step 19: Click on button delete
Step 20: Click on button delete2 -> Navigate to page ''
Step 21: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Change Password and Access Scheduling Optimization in IFS Cloud Application
Description: Log in, change the password, and navigate through various pages to access the scheduling optimization configuration.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /landing-page
Step 2: Click on link ifscloud -> Navigate to page '/auth/realms/*/protocol/openid-connect/auth'
Step 3: Login -> Navigate to page '/main/ifsapplications/web/*'
Step 4: Navigate to /main/ifsapplications/web/*
Step 5: Click on button userDropdown
Step 6: Click on button logout -> Navigate to page '/landing-page'
Step 7: Click on link ifscloud -> Navigate to page '/auth/realms/*/protocol/openid-connect/auth'
Step 8: Login -> Navigate to page '/auth/realms/*/login-actions/required-action'
Step 9: Navigate to /auth/realms/*/login-actions/required-action with params (client data, client id, execution, tab id)
Step 10: Click on input newPassword
Step 11: Enter input value in input newPassword
Step 12: Click on input confirmPassword
Step 13: Enter input value in input confirmPassword
Step 14: Click on input submit -> Navigate to page '/main/ifsapplications/web/*'
Step 15: Click on input search
Step 16: Click on input search
Step 17: Click on fndCloudHome object
Step 18: Click on fndCloudHome object
Step 19: Click on fndCloudHome object2
Step 20: Click on input search
Step 21: Enter input value in input search
Step 22: Click on link schedulingOptimizationConfig -> Navigate to page '/main/ifsapplications/web/page/PsoIntegrationConfiguration/*'
Step 23: Click on input checkbox
Step 24: Click on button globalOverflow -> Navigate to page ''
Step 25: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
